name: Paystream
description: Paystream is a modular Solana protocol that unifies peer-to-peer lending, leveraged liquidity provisioning, and yield routing into a single, capital-efficient engine. It matches lenders and borrowers at fair mid-market rates, turning idle capital into productive liquidity through automated routing and leverage-enabled LP strategies across Raydium CLMM, Meteora DLMM, and DAMM v2 pools.
